metadata.description: Data engineer or ML engineer specializing in data pipelines, analytics, and machine learning

skills.name: Python Programming Mastery
skills.description: Python fundamentals, OOP, functional programming, data manipulation

skills.name: SQL & Database Queries
skills.description: SQL mastery, complex queries, query optimization, database design

skills.name: Data Manipulation (Pandas/NumPy)
skills.description: Pandas dataframes, NumPy arrays, data cleaning, transformation

skills.name: Statistical Analysis
skills.description: Statistics fundamentals, hypothesis testing, distributions, inference

skills.name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
skills.description: ML algorithms, supervised/unsupervised learning, model evaluation

skills.name: Data Visualization
skills.description: Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, creating insightful visualizations

skills.name: Big Data Technologies (Spark)
skills.description: Apache Spark, distributed computing, Hadoop ecosystem

skills.name: ETL Pipelines & Data Engineering
skills.description: ETL design, data pipelines, Apache Airflow, data quality

skills.name: Cloud Platforms (AWS/GCP)
skills.description: Cloud data services, S3, BigQuery, Redshift, data warehousing

skills.name: Feature Engineering & Selection
skills.description: Feature creation, selection, scaling, dimensionality reduction

skills.name: Version Control & Git
skills.description: Git workflows, collaboration, version control best practices
